page.title: 07PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: One of the most popular playground games with boys and girls is chain tig.They pick who is het.Then he or she runs around until they catch someone else.Then they hold hands and catch someone and so on until everyone is in one chain.Then you start again with the first person caught het. The game the boys enjoy the most is football.They play it with a tennis ball or a tin can. At school the older girls just walk about the playground and talk.The younger girls play chasie or horses.They play horses by giving each other kiddycods.
